engChrName: September 7th, 11:25AM
engSearchText: September 7th, 11:25AM

engChrName: Wow! The scenery here's beautiful!
engSearchText: Wow! The scenery here's beautiful!
jpnChrName: わぁ、綺麗な景色ですね……！
jpnSearchText: わぁ、綺麗な景色ですね……！

engChrName: Everything's so green... You don't get a view like this anywhere I live.
engSearchText:
Everything's so green... You don't get a view like this
anywhere I live.
jpnChrName: こんなに緑も豊かで…… クルガの里じゃ考えられません。
jpnSearchText:
こんなに緑も豊かで……
クルガの里じゃ考えられません。

engChrName: Heehee. Oh, there isn't much like this near the capital, either.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Oh, there isn't much like this near the
capital, either.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、首都でも珍しいですよ。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、首都でも珍しいですよ。

engChrName: We haven't passed another car in ages—it makes it feel like we have the whole picturesque view to ourselves.
engSearchText:
We haven't passed another car in ages—it makes it
feel like we have the whole picturesque view
to ourselves.
jpnChrName: 他の車ともすれ違いませんし 自然を独り占めって感じですね。
jpnSearchText:
他の車ともすれ違いませんし
自然を独り占めって感じですね。

engChrName: That's how it goes on an old country road.
engSearchText: That's how it goes on an old country road.
jpnChrName: ハン、田舎道ってだけだろ。
jpnSearchText: ハン、田舎道ってだけだろ。

engChrName: But we're makin' good time. If we keep going like this, we'll be there in time for lunch—
engSearchText:
But we're makin' good time. If we keep going like
this, we'll be there in time for lunch—
jpnChrName: だがまあ良いペースだ。 この調子だとランチには──
jpnSearchText:
だがまあ良いペースだ。
この調子だとランチには──

engChrName: Is something wrong, Van?
engSearchText: Is something wrong, Van?
jpnChrName: ？　ヴァンさん？
jpnSearchText: ？　ヴァンさん？

engChrName: Something's not right up ahead.
engSearchText: Something's not right up ahead.
jpnChrName: ──前方、何か起きてます。
jpnSearchText: ──前方、何か起きてます。

engChrName: Might be a kid, but you're not a Kruga warrior for nothin', huh?
engSearchText:
Might be a kid, but you're not a Kruga warrior for
nothin', huh?
jpnChrName: ハッ、半人前とはいえ 流石はクルガ戦士だ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、半人前とはいえ
流石はクルガ戦士だ。

engChrName: I'm gonna pull over. Be ready for a fight.
engSearchText: I'm gonna pull over. Be ready for a fight.
jpnChrName: 手前で停めるぞ、備えろ。
jpnSearchText: 手前で停めるぞ、備えろ。

engChrName: A-All right...
engSearchText: A-All right...
jpnChrName: え、え……
jpnSearchText: え、え……

engChrName: Th-That was a close one... We were almost scarily close to that truck.
engSearchText:
Th-That was a close one... We were almost scarily
close to that truck.
jpnChrName: ひ、ひやっとしましたね…… トラックすれすれでした。
jpnSearchText:
ひ、ひやっとしましたね……
トラックすれすれでした。

engChrName: Still, at least the plan worked. We managed to get out of the city like we wanted to.
engSearchText:
Still, at least the plan worked. We managed to get out
of the city like we wanted to.
jpnChrName: でも、いよいよ国道まで出られたわね。
jpnSearchText: でも、いよいよ国道まで出られたわね。

engChrName: Where exactly are we now?
engSearchText: Where exactly are we now?
jpnChrName: この道は……
jpnSearchText: この道は……

engChrName: It's an old road that barely anyone uses since the expressway was built.
engSearchText:
It's an old road that barely anyone uses since the
expressway was built.
jpnChrName: 高速道路ができて以降、 今となっちゃ使われなくなった旧道だ。
jpnSearchText:
高速道路ができて以降、
今となっちゃ使われなくなった旧道だ。

engChrName: It's not technically a secret path, but it might as well be.
engSearchText:
It's not technically a secret path, but it might as
well be.
jpnChrName: ま、抜け道みたいなモンだな。
jpnSearchText: ま、抜け道みたいなモンだな。

engChrName: That explains it...
engSearchText: That explains it...
jpnChrName: なるほどね……
jpnSearchText: なるほどね……

engChrName: It looks like the police certainly know of it. This must be the final obstacle standing between us and the suburbs.
engSearchText:
It looks like the police certainly know of it. This must
be the final obstacle standing between us and
the suburbs.
jpnChrName: あれが最後の関門…… あそこを切り抜ければ……
jpnSearchText:
あれが最後の関門……
あそこを切り抜ければ……

engChrName: (We can't use the same tactic over and over again. So I'm thinkin'...)
engSearchText:
(We can't use the same tactic over and over again.
So I'm thinkin'...)
jpnChrName: （いや、ここまでと同じ手は厳しいだろう。   だったら──）
jpnSearchText:
（いや、ここまでと同じ手は厳しいだろう。
だったら──）

engChrName: Wait. You can't mean to...
engSearchText: Wait. You can't mean to...
jpnChrName: まさかヴァンさん……！
jpnSearchText: まさかヴァンさん……！

engChrName: We've gotten through a few checkpoints now. It's possible they're on to us at this point.
engSearchText:
We've gotten through a few checkpoints now.
It's possible they're on to us at this point.
jpnChrName: ここまで来た俺たちの情報が あちらさんに伝わってる可能性もある。
jpnSearchText:
ここまで来た俺たちの情報が
あちらさんに伝わってる可能性もある。

engChrName: If that's true, they're gonna arrest us if we stop here.
engSearchText: If that's true, they're gonna arrest us if we stop here.
jpnChrName: その場合は停まったが最後、取っ捕まるのがオチだ。
jpnSearchText: その場合は停まったが最後、取っ捕まるのがオチだ。

engChrName: So we've got no choice but to force our way through?
engSearchText: So we've got no choice but to force our way through?
jpnChrName: 強行突破するしかない、ってことね。
jpnSearchText: 強行突破するしかない、ってことね。

engChrName: If that's what you think is best, I'm ready for it.
engSearchText: If that's what you think is best, I'm ready for it.
jpnChrName: 私は覚悟できてます。
jpnSearchText: 私は覚悟できてます。

engChrName: I'm not afraid as long as I'm with all of you.
engSearchText: I'm not afraid as long as I'm with all of you.
jpnChrName: ……皆さんと一緒なら、怖くありません。
jpnSearchText: ……皆さんと一緒なら、怖くありません。

engChrName: Oh, wow! To think you'd come to trust us that much in so short a time.
engSearchText:
Oh, wow! To think you'd come to trust us that much
in so short a time.
jpnChrName: あら……ふふ、この短い付き合いで そこまで信用してくれたのね。
jpnSearchText:
あら……ふふ、この短い付き合いで
そこまで信用してくれたのね。

engChrName: You've both done so much to reassure me while we've been together. At this point, I don't even know where I'd BE without you.
engSearchText:
You've both done so much to reassure me while we've
been together. At this point, I don't even know where
I'd BE without you.
jpnChrName: お二人が何かと話しかけてくれて…… 本当に心強かったですから。
jpnSearchText:
お二人が何かと話しかけてくれて……
本当に心強かったですから。

engChrName: Aww...
engSearchText: Aww...
jpnChrName: アイラさん……
jpnSearchText: アイラさん……

engChrName: O-Of course, we wouldn't have got this far without your driving, too, Mr. Arkride!
engSearchText:
O-Of course, we wouldn't have got this far without
your driving, too, Mr. Arkride!
jpnChrName: も、もちろん、 アークライドさんが居てこそですけど！
jpnSearchText:
も、もちろん、
アークライドさんが居てこそですけど！

engChrName: It's fine. I'm used to it.
engSearchText: It's fine. I'm used to it.
jpnChrName: 別に何も言ってませんヨ。
jpnSearchText: 別に何も言ってませんヨ。

engChrName: Anyway, if you've steeled your nerves, then we're ready to go.
engSearchText:
Anyway, if you've steeled your nerves, then we're
ready to go.
jpnChrName: ……ま、依頼人が腹くくれてんなら問題ねぇ。
jpnSearchText: ……ま、依頼人が腹くくれてんなら問題ねぇ。

engChrName: We're going to reunite you with your family— whatever it takes.
engSearchText:
We're going to reunite you with your family—
whatever it takes.
jpnChrName: 絶対にご家族の元にお送りしないと、ですね。
jpnSearchText: 絶対にご家族の元にお送りしないと、ですね。

engChrName: Thank you all so much. I'll never forget the debt I owe you.
engSearchText:
Thank you all so much. I'll never forget the debt I
owe you.
jpnChrName: 皆さん……本当にありがとうございます。 このご恩は忘れません。
jpnSearchText:
皆さん……本当にありがとうございます。
このご恩は忘れません。

engChrName: Easy. Save the thanks until the job's done.
engSearchText: Easy. Save the thanks until the job's done.
jpnChrName: おっと、礼は依頼を完遂したらな。
jpnSearchText: おっと、礼は依頼を完遂したらな。

engChrName: Okay, let's do this. Don't bite your tongue.
engSearchText: Okay, let's do this. Don't bite your tongue.
jpnChrName: そんじゃあ行くぜ……舌、噛むなよ。
jpnSearchText: そんじゃあ行くぜ……舌、噛むなよ。

engChrName: They soon reached the outskirts of the city.
engSearchText: They soon reached the outskirts of the city.
jpnChrName: ──やがて一行は、首都郊外の州境に到着した。
jpnSearchText: <C1>──やがて一行は、首都郊外の州境に到着した。

engChrName: Isla's family came to meet her, and upon entrusting her with them, the job was considered complete.
engSearchText:
Isla's family came to meet her, and upon entrusting
her with them, the job was considered complete.
jpnChrName: 迎えに来ていたアイラの家族に彼女を託す形で 今回の依頼は完遂。
jpnSearchText:
迎えに来ていたアイラの家族に彼女を託す形で
今回の依頼は完遂。

engChrName: Before departing, however, they said that they were praying for her grandmother's safe recovery.
engSearchText:
Before departing, however, they said that they were
praying for her grandmother's safe recovery.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは、彼女の祖母の回復を祈りつつ──
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァンたちは、彼女の祖母の回復を祈りつつ──

engChrName: They also suggested that Isla stay in Anchorville until the national situation had calmed down.
engSearchText:
They also suggested that Isla stay in Anchorville
until the national situation had calmed down.
jpnChrName: 念のため、此度のほとぼりが冷めるまでは アンカーヴィルに留まるよう促した。
jpnSearchText:
念のため、此度のほとぼりが冷めるまでは
アンカーヴィルに留まるよう促した。

engChrName: On the way back, they decided to rely on Quatre and Risette's analyses and navigational expertise...
engSearchText:
On the way back, they decided to rely on Quatre and
Risette's analyses and navigational expertise...
jpnChrName: 帰りは、リゼットとカトルの解析やナビを頼り──
jpnSearchText: <C1>帰りは、リゼットとカトルの解析やナビを頼り──

engChrName: ...and through some effort, they were able to find a safe but slow route to make their way back into the city.
engSearchText:
...and through some effort, they were able to find a
safe but slow route to make their way back into
the city.
jpnChrName: 時間はかかるものの安全なルートを使って ３人は首都へ帰還したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
時間はかかるものの安全なルートを使って
３人は首都へ帰還したのだった。

engChrName: Quest A Return Home completed!
engSearchText: Quest A Return Home completed!
jpnChrName: クエスト【“帰省”についての相談】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>“帰省”についての相談<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: Earned
engSearchText: Earned
jpnChrName: ＳＰが上がった。
jpnSearchText: ＳＰが<C2><C0>上がった。

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。
